title: Research opportunities
content: The center offers numerous courses in the domain of 5G, Robotics, AR/VR, Medical IoT and other related topics to students in BTech and MTech. The center is well equipped with 3D printers, tools and instruments, and hundreds of sensors, actuators, and microcontrollers to facilitate student projects. --------Found this on pesu website. Is this for ec campus as well?? And how often we can use them?

comments.body: I am unsure which lab is being described here, but research labs are usually open to students from both campuses. You can only work in research labs while working with a professor as their RA - can be during research internships in the summer, or during the semester too. You cannot just walk into a lab and use the facilities without an advisor's approval.
This is in both campuses or only RR??
if I am not wrong, he is referring to ISFCR - C-IoT - CAVE labs
